page.title: 06Sunday School Ditchling
page.content: The old Ditchling Primary School turned into a Museum in l985 maintains its contact with today's children every Sunday morning when the Sunday School meets there in the Museum cafeteria.The children aged 3_10 hear Bible Stories and sing some of the choruses their grandparents might have sung _ and some new ones too!They enjoy drawing and making figures from plasticine and pipe_cleaners.Every lst Sunday the Sunday School joins in the l0 a.m.Eucharist Service in St.Margaret's Church when the children read prayers they have written themselves and often perform a short play _ this month they did "Zacchaeus in The Tree" and before that "Noah's Ark"_each child wearing an animal mask.At Christmas the Sunday School perform a nativity play.This year the children collected money for Ethiopia.
